com.susankya.schoolvalley.TextViewPlus.android:text: • Your section's routine will be downloaded from our database. You can also edit or change the routine yourself.

• Use the Routine widget to quickly see the routine through Home screen. The Routine widget updates itself smartly according to the shift (Morning/Day). For example, for morning shift, if it's Monday, the routine of Monday is shown up to 7 AM and after that the routine of Tuesday is shown. The routine of Tuesday is shown up to 7 AM of Tuesday and then it is updated for Wednesday and so on. For day shift, the routine of the next day is updated at 10 AM. Your shift can be changed in Settings.
• College notices such as notice of strike, exams, results and fees are published on our app by the college administration. You will receive push notification when a new notice is published.
• View your individual result simply by entering your roll number, selecting your class (11/12) and terminal exam. You will be notified when a result is published through Notice.
• Results for monthly test and objective test can also be viewed on the app.
• View result list of all the students for terminal exam, monthly test or objective test.

• Set of objective questions will be uploaded by the college administration. Each set will have a code or topic such as 'physics12' and 'mechanics11'. You can use the code and access the questions set.
• Take objective test for any questions set with Timer feature. A test for a questions set of 20 questions will be 20 minutes long and so on.
• Any questions set you load will be automatically saved. You can access them from Home section.
• छलफल (Chhalfal) is a discussion group where you can create your account, make posts, share images, and like and comment on other posts.
• Get notification when someone likes or comments on your post or replies to your comment on their post.
